creator: Hans Christian Andersen
description:
LibriVox recording of Fairy Tales and Stories by Hans Christian Andersen. (Translated by H. P. Paull.)

Read in English by Faith Pak; Tinflab.

This is a collection of fairy tales and stories by Hans Christian Andersen, selected and read by students from Hunter College High School. Enjoy! :) Summary by faith9p.

For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording.

For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.
subject: librivox; audiobooks;
title: Fairy Tales and Stories
